story-moment.ACQUIRING THE TESSERACT: Along with his fellow Children of Thanos and Thanos himself, Corvus Glaive participated in the attack on the Asgardian ship to secure the Tesseract.
story-moment.HUNT FOR THE MIND STONE: Corvus Glaive badly injured Vision when he and Proxima Midnight attempted to take the Mind Stone from him, halting Vision's phasing power in the process.
story-moment.BATTLE FOR WAKANDA: Corvus Glaive’s life would come to an end in Wakanda, in a vicious battle with both Vision and Captain America.

powers+abilities.HAND-TO-HAND COMBAT: A brutal combatant, Corvus Glaive is able to take on notable enemies like Vision and Captain America in hand-to-hand fights.
powers+abilities.GLAIVE: Corvus Glaive’s weapon of choice is, appropriately enough, a glaive. Tremendously powerful, the weapon is capable of piercing Vision’s vibranium body and deflecting blasts from the Mind Stone.
